help.short: Defines the If-Match condition. The patch will be performed only if the ETag of the job on the server matches this value.
The name of the job Resource within the specified resource group. job names must be between 3 and 24 characters in length and use any alphanumeric and underscore only
Set the system managed identity.
Identity type
Set the user managed identities.
User Assigned Identities
The list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used in viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups).
Contact name of the person.
List of Email-ids to be notified about job progress.
Mobile number of the contact person.
Notification preference for a job stage.
Notification is required or not.
Name of the stage.
Phone number of the contact person.
Phone extension number of the contact person.
Contact details for notification and shipping.
Managed service identity type.
Arm resource id for user assigned identity to be used to fetch MSI token.
User assigned identity properties.
Managed identity properties used for key encryption.
Type of encryption key used for key encryption.
Key encryption key. It is required in case of Customer managed KekType.
Kek vault resource id. It is required in case of Customer managed KekType.
Key encryption key for the job.
Defines secondary layer of software-based encryption enablement.
Defines Hardware level encryption (Only for disk)
Preferences related to the Encryption.
Preferred data center region.
Optional Preferences related to the reverse shipment logistics of the sku.
Preferences related to the Access Tier of storage accounts.
Indicates Shipment Logistics type that the customer preferred.
Preferences related to the shipment logistics of the sku.
Preferences related to the order
Carrier Account Number of customer for customer disk.
Name of the carrier.
Tracking Id of shipment.
Return package details of job.
Contact name of the person.
Mobile number of the contact person.
Phone number of the contact person.
Phone extension number of the contact person.
Contact Info.
Shipping address where customer wishes to receive the device.
Reverse Shipping Address and contact details for a job.
Type of address.
Name of the City.
Name of the company.
Name of the Country.
Postal code.
Flag to indicate if customer has chosen to skip default address validation
Name of the State or Province.
Street Address line 1.
Street Address line 2.
Street Address line 3.
Tax Identification Number
Extended Zip Code.
Shipping address of the customer.
Details of a job to be updated.
